data.prayer: Spirit, of the 237,962 people in the state of La Rioja who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Rioja, Argentina
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of La Rioja to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 32,054 believers in La Rioja.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in La Rioja, Argentina from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please defend the 32,054 believers in La Rioja against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of La Rioja, Argentina will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to La Rioja, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
